mapper.select: SELECT c.member_id, m.member_name ,m.member_email, m.member_tel, r.delivery_cost, m.member_addr, m.member_details_addr, u.coupon_name, u.coupon_content, u.coupon_deadline, u.coupon_condition, u.coupon_min_price, u.coupon_max_price, u.coupon_discount_price, u.coupon_discount_rate, c.cart_count, p.option_name, p.option_value, p.option_price, r.product_name, r.sale_price, r.product_cost, i.parent_code, i.upload_name FROM ar_cart c LEFT JOIN ar_option p ON c.option_code = p.option_code LEFT JOIN ar_member m ON c.member_id = m.member_id LEFT JOIN ar_products r ON p.product_code = r.product_code LEFT JOIN ar_imgs i ON p.product_code = i.product_code LEFT JOIN ar_coupon_box b ON c.member_id = b.member_id LEFT JOIN ar_coupons u ON b.coupon_code = u.coupon_code WHERE c.member_id = #{memberId} AND c.cart_code = #{cartCode}
